attributes.action: Ask the Chancellor to reconsider the timing of the implementation of his recent increases in air travel duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that a booking made before the announcement of this increase in duty should not attract the increase. I think that to impose this increase where bookings have been made and paid for is contrary to natural justice and gives the impression that this duty is more about revenue collection than a genuine concern for the environment.
